Text: cannot run, I have it with CFW 6.39 ME-6 and when i run the game it says "this game could not be started" any ideas? thnx

To run PSN games on a PSP you need to use PRO CFW

Get the 6.60 update from here:
http://www.wololo.net/downloads/index.php/version/1583

Update the PSP then download 6.60PRO-B10 fix1 and install it
http://code.google.com/p/procfw/downloads/list
I am running 6.60pro c, and i keep getting the error message game could not be started 80010002 any ideas (psp go) Also have tried the prob10 fix1 and no luck.

OK it turns out newer PSN eboots are signed with newer keys (even if the games are old) so CFW cant decrypt them without the license files. When i tested these files on all my hacked PSP's the licence files I didnt know you needed were still on the memory stick so they worked. If it is safe to upload these files without getting b& from PSN I will. sorry for the inconvenience.
TL;DR You need License files for these to work try goggling for them or I will upload mine if they don't have account info in them.
